page.title: 13Law and Order_S.W. Devon.
page.content: Today the{Police}usually use a 'C.B.' radio to communicate with each other,C.B. stands for Citizens Band.The Police in our area of Britain are the{Devon and Cornwall Constabulary,and in their area is one helicopter which is based at Exeter. P.C.Pridham is our local Police Constable,he patrols mainly three villages and occasionally a small town called {Ivybridge}.He drives a car called a 'Panda Car'. There are not many crimes committed in the area,in the last two months two 'breaking and entering' crimes have been committed.The Police use big 'Ford Granada' cars for patroling main roads and Motorways. The{Tavistock {Police} patrol the village of{ {Clearbrook}.
